Package org.apache.fop.fo.pagination

All the pagination and declaration formatting objects.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SubSequenceSpecifier Classes that implement this interface can be added to a PageSequenceMaster, and are capable of looking up an appropriate PageMaster.
 

Class Summary
AbstractPageSequence Abstract base class for the fo:page-sequence formatting object and the fox:external-document extension object.
ColorProfile The fo:color-profile formatting object.
ConditionalPageMasterReference A conditional-page-master-reference formatting object.
Declarations Declarations formatting object.
Flow Class modelling the fo:flow object.
LayoutMasterSet The layout-master-set formatting object.
PageNumberGenerator This class uses the 'format', 'groupingSeparator', 'groupingSize', and 'letterValue' properties on fo:page-sequence to return a String corresponding to the supplied integer page number.
PageSequence Abstract base implementation for page sequences.
PageSequenceMaster The page-sequence-master formatting object.
PageSequenceWrapper The fo:page-sequence-wrapper formatting object, first introduced in the XSL 1.1 WD.
Region This is an abstract base class for pagination regions
RegionAfter The fo:region-after element.
RegionBA Abstract base class for fo:region-before and fo:region-after.
RegionBefore The fo:region-before element.
RegionBody The fo:region-body element.
RegionEnd The fo:region-end element.
RegionSE Abstract base class for fo:region-start and fo:region-end.
RegionStart The fo:region-start element.
RepeatablePageMasterAlternatives A repeatable-page-master-alternatives formatting object.
RepeatablePageMasterReference A repeatable-page-master-reference formatting object.
Root The fo:root formatting object.
SideRegion Common base class for side regions (before, after, start, end).
SimplePageMaster A simple-page-master formatting object.
SinglePageMasterReference A single-page-master-reference formatting object.
StaticContent Class modelling the fo:static-content object.
Title Class modelling the fo:title object.
 

Package org.apache.fop.fo.pagination Description

All the pagination and declaration formatting objects.
